description: A quick and easy way to bring your favorite ice cold vegan frappuccino home! 4 ingredients and low fat make this a drink you can't refuse!
name: 4 Ingredient Homemade Chocolate Espresso Frappuccino (vegan)
recipeIngredient: 18 ice cubes made from chocolate dairy free milk (, about 1 cup plus 2 tablespoons)
3/4 cup unsweetened Cashew or Coconut milk (or canned light coconut milk)
1 teaspoon vanilla bean powder (or vanilla extract)
Melted chocolate drizzle (melt your favorite chocolate)
Coco whip (use this recipe or buy So Delicious Coco Whip)

recipeInstructions.text: Place frozen chocolate milk cubes, cashew/coconut milk, espresso and vanilla in a blender and blend! Use the tamper if you went low on the milk to get things moving. Top with desired toppings and try not to dive in face first.
